resources.string: Send money to anyone in the world in 3 steps
Receive the Money Transfer Control Number
Send the Money Transfer Control Number
There is no need for documents, and with over 500 000 Agent locations worldwide in over 200 countries and territories, sending money to someone internationally has never been easier.
Easily create a beneficiary and complete the payment process
You will receive the Western Union MTCN (Money Transfer Control Number) via SMS within one hour
Send this MTCN to your beneficiary to be able to redeem the funds from a Western Union agent in their current location
Send money to\nanyone in the world\nin 3 steps

Western Union payments will be made under your Single Discretionary Allowance* of R1 million per year.\n\nThere is no need for documents, and the currency you buy is reported under the Reserve Bank reporting category of “Gift (401)”.

1. To individuals and not corporations
2. A max. of R30 000 per payment
3. A max. of $8 000 per day
4. A min. of $10 per transaction

Your beneficiary’s:
1. Permanent physical address
2. Full names as displayed in their ID/Passport
3. Current location
Send this MTCN to your beneficiary to be able to redeem the funds from a Western Union agent in their current location.
Receive a Money Transfer Control Number (MTCN)
What’s a Money Transfer Control Number (MTCN)?

After you send money, you\'ll get a receipt and each receipt includes a unique tracking number (MTCN), which is a 10-digit number assigned to every money transfer you make. Your receiver will need the tracking number (MTCN) to pick up the money.
Your beneficiary needs the MTCN and their ID/Passport to collect funds.
Payments are through Western Union and can only be:
I acknowledge that this is a gift payment.
Please acknowledge that this is a gift payment
If Name/s are not stated exactly as in ID/Passport, collection can be refused.
If Surname/s are not stated exactly as in ID/Passport, collection can be refused.

SA Resident temporarily abroad - Someone who is abroad for a short period of time (for holiday, business, etc.) and will return to South Africa.\n\nNon-SA resident abroad - Someone who lives abroad permanently.
Are you sure you want to cancel this payment?
Enter an answer to your security question
Total amount due by you includes VAT and commission fees.
I have read and accept the Reserve Bank Declaration
Are you sure you want to cancel?
If you cancel, all details will be lost and you will have to start the process again. Would you like to proceed?
You cannot make international payments using a joint account. Please use another account to make a payment.
Do you want save the beneficiary?
We do not automatically save beneficiaries for once off payments. Please go back and save this beneficiary should you require for future payments.

Transaction hours (Central Africa Time) are:

Monday to Friday
08:00 - 17:00

Saturdays
08:00 - 12:00

Unavailable on Sundays and public holidays.

On %1$s

Your transaction has been successfully submitted under payment reference %2$s. The proof of payment can be viewed on Absa Online Banking website.

You will receive the Western Union MTCN (Money Transfer Control Number) via SMS within the hour. Please share the MTCN with the beneficiary.

To manage your beneficiaries, please go to Absa Online.
You will not be able to make another Western Union payment, as your last payment is still processing. Please try again in 1 hour.
You will not be able to edit these payment details if you wish to continue. Do you want to continue?

By accepting I declare that: 

• I have read the Terms of Use and know and understand the contents thereof;
• I have read the Regulatory and Compliance legal terms and understand the contents thereof.
• The information furnished above is in all respects both true and correct. 
• The currency applied for will only be used for the specific purpose stated herein. 
• The documentation presented in support of this transaction is in all respect authentic. 
• I have been informed of the limit applicable to this transaction and confirm that this limit has not been exceeded as a result of the conclusion of this transaction. 
• I consent to this information being provided to the South Africa Revenue service and/or the Financial Intelligence Center. 
• None of the counter parties/parties/related parties to this transaction, the country of origin, the country of destination pertaining to goods/services can be linked to any of the following countries Iran, North Korea, Crimea, Syria, Sudan (North and /or South), and Cuba. I hereby confirm that the bank will prohibit the transaction, instruction or accounts I may be applying for. I confirm further that the bank may also have to end its relationship with me without warning. I confirm that the bank is not responsible for any losses or damages that I may suffer because of any action in this regard. 
• I will retain the supporting documentation related to this transaction for a period of 5 (five) years, for inspection purposes by the Financial Surveillance Department of the South African Reserve Bank. 
• I fully understand that should I be required to and not submit the supporting documents related to the transaction, to the bank within the given time frames, the transaction will be cancelled. 
• I fully understand that the above provision constitutes an acknowledgement of facts and its effect will limit my right to claim that such fact is not accurate.
Amount cannot be more than %s. Please decrease your amount.
Please read and accept the Reserve Bank Declaration
Amount cannot be less than %s. Please increase your amount.
Amount cannot more than %s. Please decrease your amount.
You will not be able to pay this person again if you don\'t create a beneficiary. Would you still like to continue?
We are having trouble completing this action right now. Please try again later.
We are having trouble completing this action. Please try again.
The amount is more than your current daily payment limit. If you continue, we\'ll update your limit but you can always change it back later.
You are not FICA compliant. Please use a verified FICA account to make international payments.
You will receive the Western Union MTCN (Money Transfer Control Number) via SMS within the hour. Please share the MTCN with the beneficiary.

On %1$s

Your transaction has been successfully submitted under payment reference %2$s. The proof of payment can be viewed on Absa Online Banking website.

You will receive the Western Union MTCN (Money Transfer Control Number) via SMS within the hour. Please share the MTCN and security question and answer with the recipient.

To manage your beneficiaries, please go to Absa Online.
You will receive the Western Union MTCN (Money Transfer Control Number) via SMS within the hour. Please share the MTCN and security question and answer with the recipient.
You do not have any international payment beneficiaries.
You cannot continue with your payment
Currency not currently supported, please select another currency
Hierdie funksie is tans slegs in Engels beskikbaar as gevolg van regulatoriese en verslagdoeningsdoeleindes. Ons vra om verskoning vir enige ongerief.
The currency you want to send to the beneficiary
The currency you want the beneficiary to be paid in
